********* HISTORY ********

I began this project in 2007 to help a family member learn math. I live in Canada and they live in the United States and after a few phone calls and some email exchanges it became clear that the best way to do this was to make math videos. 

I started with the basics with Ã¢â‚¬ËœSeries IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ and it sort of grew from there. People liked what I was doing and wanted more so I continued. 

The project has grown to the point that I am now fully committed to creating a curriculum for all of high school mathematics. The plan is to put together packages for all major topics all the way up to and including an introductory course in Probability and Statistics and one for Calculus. 

I estimate that this will take me anywhere between 5 to 10 years to complete.
